sections.markdown: Tastes have changed over the past decade, as far as the naming of our children are concerned. We've put together a list of top 10 names for boys and girls from [Baby Names 2014][1] (published today) and compared them with what was popular in 2004. Take a look at the hot and the no-so-hot. [][2] [Download the data][3] [][4] [Download the data][5] [1]: http://www.ons.gov.uk/ons/rel/vsob1/baby-names--england-and-wales/2014/baby-names-in-england-and-wales--2014.html [2]: https://static.ons.gov.uk/visual/2015/08/BabyNames-Boys-v2.png [3]: https://static.ons.gov.uk/visual/2015/08/baby_names_boys_2014.csv [4]: https://static.ons.gov.uk/visual/2015/08/baby_names_girls.png [5]: https://static.ons.gov.uk/visual/2015/08/baby_names_girls_2014.csv

description.title: Top 10 baby names: How their popularity has changed over the last decade
